name: Treasure Hunt (petajs)
description:
You the Player have learned about a treasure that you must get your hands on.  You go out on the adventure but realized that its being guraded by various enemies. You must now get passed these enemies to get to the treasure.

The player jumps from platform to platform and climbs ladder while either dodging the enemies or by killing them

This game uses a shooting ability to shoot fireball at enemies and kill them. But certain enemeies are immune to this ability as they have protecteion such as shells.

This game also features an unique dash ability, that allows the player to move faster for a very limited time and will set a cooldown before the ability can be used again.
